name: Format\Chapter
description: The component for organizing an article into chapters.

properties.name: additions
properties.description: An array of ComponentLink objects. This can be used to create a ComponentLink, allowing a link to anywhere in News. Adding a link to a chapter component will make the entire component interactable. Any links used in its child components will no longer be interactable.

properties.name: components
properties.description: An array of components to display as child components. Child components are positioned and rendered relative to their parent component.

properties.name: contentDisplay
properties.description: Defines how child components are positioned within this chapter component. For example, this property can allow for displaying child components side-by-side and can make sure they are sized equally.

properties.name: role
properties.description: This component always has a role of chapter.

properties.name: scene
properties.description: A set of animations applied to any header component that is a child of this chapter. See Scene.
